column1: Requirements
Development implementation and analysis of data projects and volumes in FSS

Overseeing the management of product information management system attributes validation rules catalogs and workflow processes in collaboration with the IT department and communicating changes to the business
Development and implementation of the standardization of product data ETIM Open Datacheck BIM VDI3805 tender texts and master data management in FSS
Contribute to the new product development process by collecting and implementing new data and managing templates
Joint responsibility for the collection and cleansing of product data

Establishing and managing product data governance activities including developing and updating policies and procedures implementing new product data requirements and reviewing changes with the Product Data Governance Committee and key business partners
Communicating with customers to understand their data needs and with manufacturers and suppliers to source and collect relevant data
Optimization of the ETIM data model in cooperation with customers sales PM RD and external partners
Optimization of ERP QAD in cooperation with IT
Work closely with other regional product data resources within the company to share best practices
Execution and control of the export of product data to trading partners including data synchronization across various globalregional data pools
Proactive mapping of future data requirements in the EU
Working with product management and quality teams to ensure products are compliant with applicable regulations
Colead PIM implementation for Fluid Solutions Europe
Optimization of Salsify through an admin role
Supporting colleagues in FSE in the function of Salsify
Longterm Proposing changes to optimize data sources and processes in FSS in an advisory capacity

Providing feedback on CRF design and SDTM datasets to ensure data are collected and represented in a manner that support regulatory requirements to comply with CDISC standards CDASH SDTM and ADaM and AbbVie standard extensions to CDISC
Review and provide feedback on SDTM Trial Design Domains
Oversee the creation of SDTM definexml annotated CRF and Clinical Study Data Reviewer’s Guides for both FDA and PMDA submissions
Consult on conformance issues for SDTM andor ADaM and work with the study team to resolve the problem either by correcting the data or metadata or by providing an appropriate explanation
Basic knowledge of Enterprise Data Warehouse topologies Kimball Inmon Data Vault
Minimum 2 years of relevant work experience doing data preparation and processing
Proficiency writing analytical SQL queries in a heterogenous system landscape
Understanding of data warehouse loading principles ELT and ETL data pipelines
Strong analytical skills and a passion for data wrangling
A great team player  collaborative detailoriented and organized comfortable working in a crossfunctional and highly matrixed environment with limited resources
Bachelors degree or higher preferably in informatics engineering math statistics or equivalent experience
Working knowledge of leading cloud platforms and cloud computing services a plus preferably Azure alternatively AWS
Microsoft NET programming skills preferably C alternatively python
Knowledge of the Microsoft BI Technology Stack SSIS SSAS PowerBI and their Query and Integration Languages DAX M
Knowledge of Agile Methodologies is a plus
Your fire and passion for Big Data is more important to us than your degree in computer science statistics mathematics or physics
We are also happy to give technically interested university graduates the opportunity to familiarize themselves with the subject
As a prospective big data expert Python is not a constrictor for you but your daily tool belt alongside SQL and databases
You are also familiar with R Apache Spark Tableau or PowerBI and are interested in cloud solutions eg AWS Azure or Google Cloud
